categories.name: LLM development and alignment
categories.description: Research on the architecture, training, and deployment of large-scale language models.

categories.name: LLM Reasoning
categories.description: Techniques for improving model reasoning, consistency, and alignment with human goals.

categories.name: AI Safety
categories.description: Ensuring models behave as intended, avoiding harms such as bias, toxicity, and unsafe outputs.

categories.name: Robustness and Adversarial ML
categories.description: Defenses and attacks on AI models, including adversarial prompts and jailbreaks.

categories.name: Privacy and Data Protection
categories.description: Techniques for protecting sensitive data against leakage, memorization, and extraction.

categories.name: Threat Modeling and Red Teaming
categories.description: Systematic analysis of attacker goals, vectors, and adversarial evaluations of AI systems.

categories.name: Agent Security
categories.description: Security of LLM-based agents, covering memory, tool use, planning, and multi-agent risks.

categories.name: System and Infrastructure Security
categories.description: Traditional cybersecurity applied to AI pipelines, APIs, data flows, and deployment stacks.

categories.name: Governance, Ethics, and Policy
categories.description: Regulatory frameworks, ethical guidelines, and governance for AI security and safety.

categories.name: Evaluation and Benchmarks
categories.description: Methods and datasets for evaluating safety, robustness, and security in AI systems.

categories.name: Computational Social Science and Cultural Analytics
categories.description: NLP methods for analyzing human behavior, culture, stance, bias, misinformation, and social interaction.

categories.name: Dialogue and Interactive Systems
categories.description: Research on dialogue systems, evaluation, reasoning, bias, factuality, retrieval, and multimodal interaction.

categories.name: Discourse and Pragmatics
categories.description: Studies of coherence, cohesion, anaphora, coreference, discourse relations, and argumentation.

categories.name: Efficient and Low-Resource NLP
categories.description: Techniques for quantization, pruning, distillation, efficient training, and resource-constrained NLP.

categories.name: Ethics, Bias, and Fairness
categories.description: Evaluation and mitigation of bias, fairness, ethics, transparency, and governance in NLP.

categories.name: Text Generation
categories.description: Research on text generation, evaluation, multilingualism, adaptation, retrieval-augmented methods, and architectures.

categories.name: Human-Centered NLP
categories.description: Design and evaluation of NLP with human-in-the-loop, participatory methods, and value-sensitive design.

categories.name: Information Extraction
categories.description: Entity and relation extraction, event extraction, knowledge base construction, and multilingual IE.

categories.name: Information Retrieval and Text Mining
categories.description: Retrieval, dense representations, ranking, and contrastive learning for text mining and search.

categories.name: Interpretability and Model Analysis
categories.description: Interpretability methods, adversarial analysis, calibration, probing, robustness, and model editing.

categories.name: Language Modeling
categories.description: Research on pretraining, prompting, safety, reasoning, scaling, agents, robustness, and red teaming.

categories.name: Linguistic Theories and Psycholinguistics
categories.description: Computational models of language theories, cognition, and psycholinguistic phenomena.

categories.name: Machine Learning for NLP
categories.description: Learning methods for NLP, including self-supervision, multitask, meta learning, causality, and optimization.

categories.name: Machine Translation
categories.description: Models and methods for multilingual MT, efficiency, evaluation, adaptation, speech translation, and deployment.

categories.name: Multilingual and Cross-Lingual NLP
categories.description: Cross-lingual transfer, multilingual pretraining, less-resourced and endangered languages, and tools.

categories.name: Multimodality and Language Grounding
categories.description: Integration of language with vision, robotics, speech, and cross-modal tasks like VQA and navigation.

categories.name: NLP Applications
categories.description: Practical applications of NLP in education, healthcare, finance, legal, social good, and code generation.

categories.name: Phonology, Morphology, and Word Segmentation
categories.description: Research on morphology, phonology, word segmentation, pronunciation, and linguistic analysis.

categories.name: Question Answering
categories.description: QA across domains including commonsense, multihop, biomedical, math, multilingual, and conversational QA.

categories.name: Resources and Evaluation
categories.description: Corpus creation, benchmarking, dataset design, evaluation metrics, reproducibility, and testing methods.

categories.name: Lexical and Sentence-Level Semantics
categories.description: Research on entailment, semantic similarity, compositionality, embeddings, paraphrasing, and NLI.

categories.name: Sentiment, Style, and Argument Mining
categories.description: Stance detection, sentiment, stylistics, argument quality, framing, and generation of argumentative text.

categories.name: Speech and Spoken Language Understanding
categories.description: ASR, TTS, spoken dialogue, speech-grounded understanding, and multimodal speech technologies.

categories.name: Summarization
categories.description: Research on extractive, abstractive, conversational, multimodal, multilingual, and long-form summarization.

categories.name: Syntax and Parsing
categories.description: Part-of-speech tagging, parsing algorithms, morpho-syntax, semantic parsing, and multilingual parsing.

categories.name: Special Theme Track
categories.description: Conference-specific thematic track defined per call for papers.
